verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in Thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> And in Thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> he will <S%H1523>rejoice!<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> him his heart's <S%H8378>desire,<s%> And Thou hast not <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H782>request<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

For Thou dost <S%H6923>meet<s%> him with the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H9185>things;<s%> Thou dost <S%H7896>set<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H6337>fine<s%> <S%H6337>gold<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H9132>life<s%> of Thee, Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> it to him, <S%H753>Length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
His <S%H9202>glory<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> through Thy <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> <S%H1935>Splendor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> Thou dost <S%H7737>place<s%> upon him.

For Thou dost <S%H7896>make<s%> him <S%H1293>most<s%> <S%H1293>blessed<s%> <S%H5703>forever;<s%> Thou dost <S%H2302>make<s%> him <S%H2302>joyful<s%> with <S%H8057>gladness<s%> in Thy <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
For the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And through the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> he will not be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>
Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> will <S%H4672>find<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H340>enemies;<s%> Your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> will <S%H4672>find<s%> out those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you.

You will <S%H7896>make<s%> them as a <S%H784>fiery<s%> <S%H8574>oven<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H6440>anger;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1104>swallow<s%> them up in His <S%H639>wrath,<s%> And <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> them.
Their <S%H6529>offspring<s%> Thou wilt destroy from the <S%H6>earth,<s%> And their <S%H776>descendants<s%> from among the <S%H2233>sons<s%> of <S%H1121>men.<s%>
<S%H3588>Though<s%> they <S%H5186>intended<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Thee, [And] <S%H2803>devised<s%> a <S%H4209>plot,<s%> They will not <S%H3201>succeed.<s%>
For Thou wilt <S%H7896>make<s%> them <S%H7896>turn<s%> their <S%H7926>back;<s%> Thou wilt <S%H3559>aim<s%> with Thy <S%H4340>bowstrings<s%> at their <S%H6440>faces.<s%>
Be Thou <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in Thy <S%H5797>strength;<s%> We will <S%H7891>sing<s%> and <S%H2167>praise<s%> Thy <S%H1369>power.<s%>
